ComicInfo.Summary:
Sonja has the final face off with Kahar and his band.
Kahar and his band encounter Frottage and his troup. Frottage preforms a play that suggests that Sonja headed for Khitai.
Kahar vows to hunt Sonja down.
The Pazyrk recalls his slain mother and his thirst for vengeance that led him down a path of killing. He leaves the fire and wanders into the woods and is slain by Red Sonja.
Red Sonja frees the God of the Green from a witch and makes love to him. He creates a child in her image.
Red Sonja shares a drink wth the bartender.
Red Sonja rescues Jenny from a band of thieves.
Kahar and his band continue their pursuit of Sonja and are introduced to Jenny, the mller's daughter.
The band continue their quest while Sonja kills one of them.
Sonja rides into town looking for a blacksmith to repair her armor. Instead Gerd provides with new armor which becomes her trademark.
Kahar and his band encounter Gerd as they continue their quest for Sonja.
Gertrelle attempts to call and bind a goddess. Sonja interrupts the spell earning her Gretrelle's enmity.
Horthak jpins with Kahar and his band in the search for Sonja. They meet up with Gertrelle who has another tale of Sonja.
Horthak and Sonja attempt to rob the palace of Zaul, who is ensnared in a magic spell. Horthak awakens Zaul's horde before Sonja can slay Zaul. Zaul attacks Horthak and Sonja slays Zaul leaving Horthak for dead. Horthak however is kept alive by the sorcerer's magic and thirsts for vengeance.
Red Sonja escorts a servant of the Goddess to her next mission.
Gordrak recounts the tale of how he and Sonja defeated the demon's mount and captured the demon's ruby.
Captain Vitale Boulos narrates the story of how Red Sonja drowned fighting a demon squid that attacked and destroyed his ship.
Eles and Dagar continue the hunt for Red Sonja
Eles tells the story of how Red Sonja killed the Howling God and stole the ruby eyes of of his statue.
Kahar, Eles and their band hunt Red Sonja
ComicInfo.Title: The Play's the Thing; The Pazyryk; She Lives Still; Jenny's Story: Parallax; "You admire her."; Gerd's Story: What Lies Beneath; Gertrelle's Lament; The Palace of the Necromancer; Double-Edged; Legends of Red Sonja; The Undefeated; La Sonja Rossa; Legends of Red Sonja (part 2); Eyes of the Howling God; Legends of Red Sonja (part 1)
